entries.title: Claims of unlawful killings by British soldiers in Afghanistan and 'cover-up' to be probed by inquiry
entries.description: Allegations of unlawful killings by British soldiers in Afghanistan and a 'cover-up' are to be the subject of a top-level inquiry.

entries.title: Peru declares state of emergency after protests leave at least eight dead
entries.description: A 30-day state of emergency has been declared in Peru after the country's president was impeached and a week of protests left at least eight dead.

entries.title: People 'risk freezing to death' as Russia attacks Ukraine's power grid
entries.description: People in Ukraine are at risk of dying of cold this winter because of Russian attacks against power supplies, the governor of the eastern region of Donetsk has said.

entries.title: Boy killed amid clashes between France and Morocco fans
entries.description: A boy has been killed in Montpellier amid clashes between France and Morocco fans in the city following the World Cup semi-final.

entries.title: Man who carved 'I'm sorry' on chest after raping and murdering teen girl executed in US
entries.description: A man has been executed by lethal injection in the US for the rape and murder of a 16-year-old girl more than two decades ago.
